admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The first phase of the Borrower's
            Development Plan, 1972-1976, including: the installation of
            approximately 88,000 lines of automatic switching equipment
            and associated plant in Bangkok; the installation of
            approximately 43,000 lines of automatic exchange equipment
            and associated plant in provincial networks; expansion of
            trunk routes and the introduction of subscriber trunk
            dialing; studies of tariffs, organization and operations.
